text: How well does Makie work on a MacBook Pro (year old)?

elements.text: How well does Makie work on a MacBook Pro (year old)?

text: I develop it on a 2017 model and I think it works well, except for an annoying glfw bug which causes windows not to close correctly

text: But we can't fix that on our side

text: I’m trying some examples, though it’s hard to find examples. Usually if something uses a GPU it means it doesn’t work as this requires an Nvidia or AMD GPU.

elements.text: I’m trying some examples, though it’s hard to find examples. Usually if something uses a GPU it means it doesn’t work as this requires an Nvidia or AMD GPU.

text:
I’m trying the first plot from Makie documentation on a Jupyter notebook.
I’m getting output from GLMakie and CairoMakie, WGLMakie gives a blank so I assume it does not work on Jupyter notebooks. Both Safari and Chrome.
